item.title: Miguel Uribe, Colombian Senator Shot at Campaign Event, Dies at 39
item.description: The presidential hopeful spent nine weeks at the hospital in critical condition after he was shot at a campaign rally.

item.title: Map: 6.1-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Turkey
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: A Sidelined Zelensky Warns That Russia Will Try to Deceive the U.S.
item.description: Ukraine fears that the Kremlin will try to convince President Trump at U.S.-Russian talks in Alaska that Ukraine, not Russia, is the obstacle to peace...

item.title: Israel’s Plan for Gaza City Is Still Unclear
item.description: The Israeli government said last week that it wanted to capture Gaza City, but how and when it will proceed has yet to be decided.

item.title: A Haven for English in the Most French of North American Cities
